mapper.select: select A.*, T.* from athletes A join teams T on T.team_id = A.team_id where A.athlete_id = #{id};
select a.* , e.* from athletes a left join events_athletes ea on ea.athlete_id = a.athlete_id left join events e on e.event_id = ea.event_id where e.event_name = #{eventName};
mapper.insert: insert into athletes (athlete_id, athlete_name, gender, age, team_id) values (#{athleteId}, #{athleteName}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{team.teamId})
